mapper.select: INSERT INTO ApplyContract(contractID, customerID, customerName, customerPhoneNum, insuranceID, insuranceName, paymentCycle, insuranceFee, securityFee, period) VALUES (#{contractID}, #{customerID}, #{customerName}, #{customerPhoneNum}, #{insuranceID}, #{insuranceName}, #{paymentCycle}, #{insuranceFee}, #{securityFee}, #{period})
